1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.

Newly listed charming craftsman style bungalow located in Elmwood/ Claremont area at 2947A Pine Avenue. This two story one bedroom cottage has hardwood floors throughout as well as lots of windows and is filled with beautiful details such as original wainscoting and plenty of built in craftsman-style storage. The bungalow is in a quiet residential tree-lined area that allows for privacy and is close to major shopping and eateries on College. This is a low maintenance landscaped, must-see property filled with original charm. 
Originally built in 1920, this property has been newly renovated for all modern conveniences. To the left of the porch and living room is a quaint seating area and dining space with built in storage as well as a newly renovated kitchen and separate laundry room complete with new washer and dryer and more additional storage. The open beamed kitchen has new cabinets, stainless steel refrigerator and a vintage stove for your convenience.
The original wooden staircase leads to a hallway with a large bedroom on the left with walk --in closet and adjacent private outdoor balcony. There is a large full bath with dual shower and tub combination, Carrera marble counter and new fixtures. Also adjoining the bedroom/bathroom is an extra room that could be used as a home office, sitting room or den. 
Being just a short walk to Rockridge Bart, this property is a conveniently located to almost anywhere in the San Francisco Bay Area. Located 4 blocks East of College Avenue, this property is close to the post office, major banking, shopping, restaurants, and parks. Nearby markets include a newly expanded Safeway, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, and Oliveto Market Hall. Close distance to shopping, many upscale boutiques, Rialto Cinemas, and restaurants including: Wood Tavern, Trattoria La Siciliana, Zachary's. Also, nearby are many coffee shops are also in the near vicinity; Elmwood Café, Cole Coffee, Peet's and Philz Coffee.
